active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the ethical and practical trade-offs of transparency versus controlled disclosure in stakeholder communications during an active ransomware incident. Support arguments with references to NIST, FIRST, or NCSC guidelines and real-world examples like the SolarWinds breach.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Incident Response. Topic: 'Stakeholder Communication' (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 002_Incident Response And Forensics > 002_Incident Response Team Organization > 003_Roles and Responsibilities > Support Functions > Stakeholder Communication). Use this research context: Effective stakeholder comms in IR builds trust; stakeholders (internal/external); frameworks (NIST SP 800-61/CSF for plans/contact lists, FIRST for coordination, NCSC for reporting/media); best practices (pre-defined plans, spokespersons, templates, escalation, training, logging, debriefs). Incorporate: Learning objectives [paste array above]; Active learning [paste activities]; Scaffolding [paste layers]; Prior knowledge (IR lifecycle, CSIRT roles). Generate 30 high-quality flashcards following the exact schema: Front (question with Bloom tag), Back (answer/explanation/distractors/metadata). Cover all Bloom levels/objectives proportionally, all scaffolding layers, voter priorities (completeness on best practices, pedagogy via Bloom/scaffolding, concept map). Ensure web-grounded (cite NIST/FIRST/NCSC), university pedagogy (active recall, distractors for critical thinking). Output as numbered list in markdown format, optimized for Anki/Quizlet import.
